segments.text: Do you know what you want to eat for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you feel like having ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to get some pizza .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had pizza for lunch yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what you want to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to get a burger ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See , I had a burger for lunch yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about I get pizza and you get a burger ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do they sell both at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They sell pizza and burgers at the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S2
